title: 82/315/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 May 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'TRACOR - digital signal analyzer, model TN-1500-8A, with accessories', may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 May 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'TRACOR - digital signal analyzer, model TN-1500-8A, with accessories' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/315/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'TRACOR - digital signal analyzer, model TN-1500-8A, with accessories', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 9 November 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 May 1982.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 134, 31. 5. 1979, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
